[[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Old Grange.jpg|thumb|300px|Old Grange in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'']]
The '''Old Grange''' was a granary located in [[Hobbiton]] just down the hill from [[Bag End]] north of [[the Water]], west of the [[Hobbiton Road]].  

The '''Grange''' was torn down during the [[War of the Ring]] and replaced with rows of tarred sheds.<ref>{{RK|VI8}}</ref>  It may have been rebuilt after the war.

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:Known as simply "the Grange", the granary is located directly south of the [[Party Field]].
